alert.note: Alert for Sampson; Wayne (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 7:00PM EDT until July 29 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN WAYNE AND NORTHEASTERN SAMPSON COUNTIES... At 659 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Olive to near Clinton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Mount Olive, Newton Grove, Turkey and Hobbton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
